channel.title: Welcome to Maxim's Site! on Maxim Rebguns
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Maxim's Site! on Maxim Rebguns

item.title: My Journey in Architecture
item.description: After two years of working on an architectural project, it is ready to see the light of day. Read about my exploration of an architect’s work, starting at the sketch phase, and ending with a fully-working 2D and 3D model ready to construct.

item.title: New Russian School
item.description: My goal in this project was to design a completely new building for the Russian School of Austin. Follow along with me in my journey through the world of architecture as I sketch, plan, and model a building from the ground up.

item.title: Bitwise Operators and Bitboards
item.description: Bitwise Operators and Bitboards is an interactive presentation about the importance of bitwise operators, and demonstrates one application of them: bitboards. The presentation is intended for those new to low-level programming and can be presented in about 15 minutes.

item.title: Choosing the right element â€“ accessible web design
item.description: Accessible design means thinking beyond the average user and ensuring that every human being can meaningfully interact with software. This article explores using semantic HTML to make webpages screen reader-friendly.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first ever post. It is mostly just a test of the blogging platform. You won’t find any interesting content here.
